about_the_game:
Fix This House is a relaxing and colorful puzzle game where your task is to fix the building using a variety of blocks. Arrange the blocks as you please, and add the finishing touch with a roof or a slab. Unleash your inner architect, all while enjoying the soothing sounds of nature and music. Solve puzzles, explore the world, and take your time!



Easily place and arrange blocks with intuitive controls, letting you focus on the creative process of rebuilding and designing beautiful structures.



It's not that simple. Explore the puzzle, discover new possibilities.



Enjoy soothing music and the calming sounds of nature, from chirping crickets to the gentle waves of the sea.


  • Over 110 building blocks
  • 9 vibrant color options for blocks
  • Includes both individual blocks and complex structures made of multiple blocks
  • Immersive nature sounds: birds singing, trees rustling, crickets chirping, and more
  • Day, night, spring, fall - all seasons and times of day await you in the game
  • Detailed and fun interactions with the environment
A fully immersive experience awaits you in Fix This House!


Royalty Free Music: You can safely stream and record videos 🎶

Fix This House is a relaxing and colorful puzzle game where your task is to fix the building using a variety of blocks. Arrange the blocks as you please, and add the finishing touch with a roof or a slab. Unleash your inner architect, all while enjoying the soothing sounds of nature and music. Solve puzzles, explore the world, and take your time!



Easily place and arrange blocks with intuitive controls, letting you focus on the creative process of rebuilding and designing beautiful structures.



It's not that simple. Explore the puzzle, discover new possibilities.



Enjoy soothing music and the calming sounds of nature, from chirping crickets to the gentle waves of the sea.


  • Over 110 building blocks
  • 9 vibrant color options for blocks
  • Includes both individual blocks and complex structures made of multiple blocks
  • Immersive nature sounds: birds singing, trees rustling, crickets chirping, and more
  • Day, night, spring, fall - all seasons and times of day await you in the game

A fully immersive experience awaits you in Fix This House!

legal_notice: This application does not collect any information. Enjoy :)

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: 2Ghz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel UHD 620
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Please check all available drivers if you're having problems. NVidia manufacturer drivers may work better than opensource ones.
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor: 2.5Ghz Dual Core
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated GPU
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Please check all available drivers if you're having problems. NVidia manufacturer drivers may work better than opensource ones.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.15
  • Processor: Apple Silicon / Intel x64
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.15
  • Processor: Apple Silicon / Intel x64
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

short_description: Immerse yourself in a relaxing and minimalist puzzle game where your task is to fix the building using a variety of blocks. Enjoy the interactive environment, soothing music, and sounds of nature. Solve puzzles, explore the world, and take your time!
